summary: A shy, young woman, living a sheltered life in a small southern town, embarks on a journey to self-awareness when she falls in love with an eccentric rock star.
cast: Lili Taylor|Guy Pearce|Irma P. Hall|Tom Bower|Bruno Kirby|Veronica Cartwright|Shawnee Smith|Sara Rue|John Hawkes|Marshall Bell|Jo Ann Farabee|Harv Morgan|Jason Russel Waller|Lew Temple|Jason Kavalewitz|Jeff McMillioan|Brian Stack|Kevin Stack|Billy Harvey|Mike Hynes|Michael Ramos|Eric Tatuaka|Jamie Dickerson|Tony Frank|James N. Harrell|Clea DuVall|Keith McDermott|Topher Glenn|Gary Ragland|Dan Bennett|Kirk Watson|Doris Gramm|Vincent James Prendergast|Brian Prendergast|Mike Keller|Johnny Goudie|Floyd Freeman|Norman Bennett|Margaret Bowman|Stacy Bellew|Greg Corner|James Douglas|Dan Eggleston|Johanna Goldsmith|Michael Gottschall|David Houston|Alicia McCutcheon|Daria Prendergast|Brad Schreiber|Jordan Stone|Scott Teeters|Chris Warner
title: A Slipping-Down Life
